content.html: does anybody else get sunny weather guilt? like you're supposed to be outside enjoying it, but in actual fact you absolutely hate being too hot. a nice 18-20 degrees is perfect to me - anything higher is just uncomfy. but I feel like I should be out enjoying it...
content.value:
does anybody else get sunny weather guilt? like you're supposed to be outside enjoying it, but in actual fact you absolutely hate being too hot.

a nice 18-20 degrees is perfect to me - anything higher is just uncomfy. 

but I feel like I should be out enjoying it...
